headline: Apollo Funds Reach Agreement with American Securities to Acquire Trace3, a Leading Technology Solutions Provider Driving Adoption of Next-Generation Technology and AI
summary: Strategic Investment to Accelerate Trace3’s Growth and Expand Solutions Across Security, Hybrid Cloud and AIIRVINE, Calif. and NEW YORK, Aug. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo (NYSE: APO) today announced that funds managed by its affiliates (the “Apollo Funds”) have agreed to acquire Trace3, a leading provider of enterprise and commercial technology solutions, from American Securities. headline: Listen: Why Some Money Managers Are Trailing the Market
summary: Shares of publicly traded private-equity firms, also known as alternative asset managers, have historically risen and fallen with public markets, often with slightly bigger swings in both directions.  The performance of these asset managers matters because they’re the biggest fee payers to Wall Street banks.

raw.headline: Listen: Why Some Money Managers Are Trailing the Market
